origin_prompt.content:
你能够调用以下的API:
{'name': 'GovernmentPolicyAPI.fetch_policy', 'description': 'This function retrieves the latest government policies related to a specified area, such as rural finance, and for a given year.', 'required_parameters': [{'name': 'policyArea', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': 'The area of policy, e.g., rural_finance, education, health.'}, {'name': 'year', 'type': 'NUMBER', 'description': 'The year for which the policy is to be fetched.'}], 'optional_parameters': [], 'return_data': [{'name': 'policyDocument', 'description': 'The document containing the latest policy details.'}]}
请用以下格式进行回复:
想法: 你这一步的目标
动作: 你要调用的API名称
动作参数: JSON格式的参数输入,全部写在一行
调用工具 GovernmentPolicyAPI.fetch_policy, 它的参数输入如下: 'policyArea'是'rural_finance', 'year'是'2024'.
